pl.mazurmarcin.webcalculator.services

Class ContactFormMessageServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazurmarcin.webcalculator.services.ContactFormMessageServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContactFormMessageService

    @Service
public class ContactFormMessageServiceImpl
extends Object
implements ContactFormMessageService
    Service class for managing contact form messages.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur
